value:
Days like this remind me of my time
as a gladiator. And some things not
worth remembering...

I have three men I trust completely:
Bord, Cord, and Barst. All three are
true warriors.

Rest when you can. You have
to be ready to move whenever
fighting breaks out.

Can you use a sword? I'm looking
for a sparring partner. Not that
I'm good at holding back...

I take care of my sword to make
sure it doesn't rust. It's a habit
that's served me for a long time.

You're $Nu?$k$pMy employer sent me to say hello.
Oh, who sent me, you ask?
It was $Nf.

Hm. So I had more power hidden
inside me.
I still have a ways to go.

Thanks. I'll pay you back on the
battlefield.

I am Ogma, a mercenary from Talys.
If you need strength put to a
task...I'm your man.

Since meeting you all, I've learned
that strength comes in many forms.$k$pThe strength to protect peace...
is not the strength I learned as a
gladiator, killing for sport.$k$pI've learned much from you,
$Nu. And I will
learn more yet.$k$pI will become stronger. I will learn
to swing my blade in service of a
lasting peace.
If I start a job, I finish it.
I've only ever been good at one thing.
I need to get ready for the next battle.
I can't lose. For either of our sakes.
